title: Start
body:
<<setsprite Left Talia neutral>>: (Wow, this room sure is fancy. I wonder if this could be where the <<setsprite DialgoueRunner Prince neutral right>> lives?)
[[Next|2]]

<<setsprite Right Prince neutral>> (offscreen): Augh!
[[Next|3]]

<<setsprite Left Talia neutral>>: (Huh? What's going on?)
[[Next|4]]

The Prince suddenly flies through the air and lands at Talia's feet defeated. (this is an animation)
[[5]]

<<setsprite Left Talia neutral>>: (Is that... the Prince...?What is he wearing…?)

[[Next|6]]

title: StoryTitle
body: Untitled Story

<<setsprite DialgoueRunner Talia neutral left>>: Sir… uh…. Your Highness, Mr. Prince, Sir? Are you okay?
[[Next|7]]

<<setsprite DialgoueRunner Carabosse neutral right>> (offscreen): HAHAHAHAHAHAHA
[[Next|8]]

Carabosse enters, looking evil as usual (this is an animation)
[[9]]

<<setsprite DialgoueRunner Talia neutral left>>: Carabosse!
[[Next|10]]

<<setsprite DialgoueRunner Carabosse neutral right>>: That's right, it's MEEEEEEEEEE!!!!!!!!!I've come to kill your Prince, so your precious Princess will never be awoken!

[[Next|11]]

<<setsprite DialgoueRunner Carabosse neutral right>>: Oh, and you're here too, so I might as well kill you while I'm at it.
[[Next|12]]

<<setsprite DialgoueRunner Prince neutral right>>: Not….. on… my… watch…..
[[Next|13]]

He slowly gets up. (animation)
[[14]]

<<setsprite DialgoueRunner Prince neutral right>>: It's my… duty… as the <<setsprite DialgoueRunner Prince neutral right>> of this kingdom… to protect its inhabitants… from the likes of you!
[[Next|15]]

He wobbles a little, and then collapses again. (animation)
[[16]]

<<setsprite DialgoueRunner Carabosse neutral right>>: Ha! Oh, this is just too good! Look at your savior! Collapsed on the ground like a big baby! This kingdom and the Princess are done for!
[[Next|17]]

<<setsprite DialgoueRunner Prince neutral right>>: (mumble mumble)
[[Next|18]]

<<setsprite DialgoueRunner Talia neutral left>>: Uh… Your Highness, Sir? Did you say something?
[[Next|19]]

<<setsprite DialgoueRunner Prince neutral right>>: Take... My sword.......
[[Next|20]]

<<setsprite DialgoueRunner Talia neutral left>>: What? I don't know how to use a sword!
[[Next|21]]

<<setsprite DialgoueRunner Prince neutral right>>: Please... You must.... Save..... The kingdom........
[[Next|22]]

The Prince hands his sword to Talia. Something pops up explaining how the sword works. (animation)
[[23]]

<<setsprite DialgoueRunner Carabosse neutral right>>: Ha! You expect to defeat me, when not even Mr. Beefcake over here could? Oh, this is going to be fun!
[[Next|24]]
<<setsprite DialgoueRunner Talia neutral left>>: (Welp... Here goes)
